results.title: Effect of Vitamin D supplementation on reduction in levels of HbA1 in patients recently diagnosed with type 2 Diabetes Mellitus having asymptomatic Vitamin D deficiency
results.text_hl: At baseline, 1st and 2nd visit, in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group, mean HbA1c was 7.59+-0.47%, 7.46+-0.25% and 7.30+-0.29%.

citations.NLM: Randhawa FA, Mustafa S, Khan DM, Hamid S. Effect of Vitamin D supplementation on reduction in levels of HbA1 in patients recently diagnosed with type 2 Diabetes Mellitus having asymptomatic Vitamin D deficiency Pak J Med Sci. 2017 Jul-Aug;33(4):881-885. PMID: 29067058
citations.BibTeX: @article{29067058, title={Effect of Vitamin D supplementation on reduction in levels of HbA1 in patients recently diagnosed with type 2 Diabetes Mellitus having asymptomatic Vitamin D deficiency}, author={Randhawa FA and Mustafa S and Khan DM and Hamid S}, journal={Pak J Med Sci}, volume={33}, number={4}, pages={881-885}}

results.title: Metformin induces human esophageal carcinoma cell pyroptosis by targeting the miR-497/PELP1 axis.
results.text_hl: @GENE_PELP1 @GENE_27043 @@@Proline-, glutamic acid- and leucine-rich protein-1@@@ (@GENE_PELP1 @GENE_27043 @@@PELP1@@@) is a scaffolding oncogene and upregulated @GENE_PELP1 @GENE_27043 @@@PELP1@@@ in advanced stages of @DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@ is highly associated with @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ progression and @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ outcomes. Intriguingly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment leads to @<m>DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@gasdermin D@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@GSDMD@@@)-mediated pyroptosis, which is abrogated by forced expression of @GENE_PELP1 @GENE_27043 @@@PELP1@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Li K, Lin X, Yao Z, Wang S, Xiong X, Ning Z, Wang J, Xu X, Jiang Y, Liu D, Chen Y, Zhang D, Zhang H. Metformin induces human esophageal carcinoma cell pyroptosis by targeting the miR-497/PELP1 axis. Cancer Lett. 2019 May 28;450():22-31. PMID: 30771436
citations.BibTeX: @article{30771436, title={Metformin induces human esophageal carcinoma cell pyroptosis by targeting the miR-497/PELP1 axis.}, author={Wang L and Li K and Lin X and Yao Z and Wang S and Xiong X and Ning Z and Wang J and Xu X and Jiang Y and Liu D and Chen Y and Zhang D and Zhang H}, journal={Cancer Lett}, volume={450}, pages={22-31}}

results.title: A challenging case of diffuse diabetic musculoskeletal system involvement: diagnostic confusion with rheumatoid arthritis.
results.text_hl: Her past medical history disclosed that she had been using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ due to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ for 8 years.

citations.NLM: Tasoglu O, Dogan-Aslan M, Yenigun D, Ozgirgin N. A challenging case of diffuse diabetic musculoskeletal system involvement: diagnostic confusion with rheumatoid arthritis. Acta Reumatol Port. 2015 Jan-Mar;40(1):77-80. PMID: 24880140
citations.BibTeX: @article{24880140, title={A challenging case of diffuse diabetic musculoskeletal system involvement: diagnostic confusion with rheumatoid arthritis.}, author={Tasoglu O and Dogan-Aslan M and Yenigun D and Ozgirgin N}, journal={Acta Reumatol Port}, volume={40}, number={1}, pages={77-80}}

results.title: Vitamin D Supplementation in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: The Vitamin D for Established Type 2 Diabetes (DDM2) Study
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@Vitamin D3@@@ at 4000 IU/d did not change ISR or HbA1c in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with well-controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ not selected for @<m>DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@vitamin D deficiency@@@.

citations.NLM: Angellotti E, D'Alessio D, Dawson-Hughes B, Nelson J, Cohen RM, Gastaldelli A, Pittas AG. Vitamin D Supplementation in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: The Vitamin D for Established Type 2 Diabetes (DDM2) Study J Endocr Soc. 2018 Apr 1;2(4):310-321. PMID: 29577107
citations.BibTeX: @article{29577107, title={Vitamin D Supplementation in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: The Vitamin D for Established Type 2 Diabetes (DDM2) Study}, author={Angellotti E and D'Alessio D and Dawson-Hughes B and Nelson J and Cohen RM and Gastaldelli A and Pittas AG}, journal={J Endocr Soc}, volume={2}, number={4}, pages={310-321}}

results.title: Management of Glioblastoma Multiforme in a Patient Treated With Ketogenic Metabolic Therapy and Modified Standard of Care: A 24-Month Follow-Up
results.text_hl: Serum testing revealed @<m>DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@vitamin D deficiency@@@ and elevated levels of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@.

citations.NLM: Elsakka AMA, Bary MA, Abdelzaher E, Elnaggar M, Kalamian M, Mukherjee P, Seyfried TN. Management of Glioblastoma Multiforme in a Patient Treated With Ketogenic Metabolic Therapy and Modified Standard of Care: A 24-Month Follow-Up Front Nutr. 2018;5():20. PMID: 29651419
